fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: At any time, reroll your current role as if it was the beginning of the night. 1 use. You will keep this ability at all times when becoming a new role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Become another random role at the beginning of each night, the role doesn't have to exist. You cannot copy Unique roles that exist, besides that there are no limitations whatsoever (you can even become part of factions that don't exist in the game). Keep one random attribute from the previous role when you switch. You **do not** gain access to factional chats.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Attempt to complete whatever goal you are given. If you complete a goal you are given, you will win regardless of what your future goals state.
